actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution creating a special committee to study the status of land grants from the King of Spain and the Government of Mexico.

summary.text: Creates within the House of Representatives a special committee to investigate the legal, political, and diplomatic status of lands which were subject to grants from the King of Spain and the Government of Mexico prior to the acquisition of the American Southwest as a result of the Treaty of Guadalupe-Hidalgo.

titles.title: A resolution creating a special committee to study the status of land grants from the King of Spain and the Government of Mexico.
